data.title: Rdp-alignment
data.description: Tools for pairwise sequence comparison, distance calculation, and hidden markov model sequence scoring (using HMMER3 models).  Many RDP Projects require this package.
data.name: AlignmentTools

evidence: "RDP Alignment tools package" and links to related RDPTools and RDP tutorial at rdp.cme.msu.edu indicate an institutional RDP project rather than an individual maintainer.

"The Alignment tools package contains commands to do defined community analysis ... pairwise alignment and hidden markov model" â€“ users run commands via `java -jar /path/to/AlignmentTools.jar`, indicating an end-user application.
Usage section describes commands that compare nucleotide reads to reference sequences and compute alignments and k-nearest neighbors, directly performing sequence analysis for research.
